article: I have always heard the saying, "Any guy can be a 'Dad', but it takes a real man to be a 'Father'." This has become qutie true in my life since the birth of my son, Joshua. Since the birth of my son things have changed a lot in my life, but the changes have been _ ! My wife and I have been through many _ moments which have made both of us _ . My son was born with some medical prombles that _ his regular doctors. He was put on several different medications, but he did not get any better. He had a bad breathing problem, and he could not keep his food down. My wife and I were both told many times by people that Joshua looked life he was born early; he had not gained much _ since he was born. As time progressed his regular doctor sent my wife and I to Louisville to a _ by the name of Dr. Eld. He was astonished by my son's condition, too. Many different tests were _ on Joshua. The time spents there was very _ for my wife and I. But we did make it through with God's _ . Joshua is one year and one month old now and has gotten much better since then. His _ has been amazing and he is up to 27 pounds now. I keep telling my wife, that if he keeps growing like this he might get a football _ sooner or later. There is saying that has helped me get through these troublesome times. "Problems will either make you or _ you." When you think the darkest hours are upon you, remember the _ is just in sight.
